subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Mets Manager Terry Collins took a reasonable gamble in starting the rookie Matz in trying to clinch the series against the Dodgers. Then the Mets’ bats fell silent.
snippet: Mets Manager Terry Collins took a reasonable gamble in starting the rookie Matz in trying to clinch the series against the Dodgers. Then the Mets’ bats fell silent.
